definition.en: (Some kind of precious apparel); see Waetzoldt, MEE 12 (2001), 325, who tentatively translates 'pendant in the shape of a mountain goat'. Pasquali, 'Lessico' (2005), connects it to √ḥrm, 'to cover'; Archi, 'Jewels' (2002), 187, translates 'pettorale'.

example.en: ŠU₂+ŠA gin₂-DILMUN ku₃:bar₆ šu-bal-ak₄ / 4 gin₂-DILMUN ku₃-gi / ni-zi-mu / 4 ʾa₃-ra-ma-tum / Zi-mi-ni-ku₃:bar₆ / MA-LIK-TUM Bur-ma-anki 20 shekels of silver of the value of 4 shekels of gold, for the plating of 4 (precious items), for Zimini-ku₃:bar₆ queen of Burman.
